Docs.param: The public identifier of the external entity being referenced, or null if none was supplied.
The system identifier of the external entity being referenced.
Docs.summary: Allow the application to resolve external entities.
Docs.returns: An InputSource object describing the new input source, or null to request that the parser open a regular URI connection to the system identifier.
